content: knitted jacket for baby in drops merino extra fine the piece is worked top down with raglan garter stitch and stocking stitch pattern me-084-by yarn group b see striped dreams pants pattern here 1 **sizes** 0/1 - 1/3 - 6/9 - 12/18 months 2 - 3/4 years child s height in cm 48/52 - 56/62 - 68/74 - 80/86 92 - 98/104 **yarn** drops merino extra fine from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 150-150-200-200 200-250 g colour 47 sage green **buttons** drops buttons no 521 5-6-6-6- 6-6 items **needles** drops circular needle size 4 mm length 80 cm drops circular needle size 3 mm length 80 cm drops double pointed needles size 4 mm drops double pointed needles size 3 mm the technique magic loop can be used you then only need circular needle of 80 cm in each size **knitting gauge** 21 stitches in width and 28 row in height with stocking stitch/42 row in height with garter stitch = 10 x 10 cm 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/45-2-striped-dreams
